headline: Is Aon Now a Value Opportunity After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Aon is quietly turning into a value opportunity or just an expensive defensive play, you are not alone. This article is going to unpack that question head on. The stock has slipped about 2.5% over the last week and is down 7.9% over the past year, a noticeable pullback that contrasts with its 75.9% gain over the last 5 years. Recently, investors have been digesting Aon's continued push into data driven risk, health, and retirement advisory solutions, which...
